name: api-qa-weaver
description: AI-powered API testing toolkit featuring intelligent test generation, contract learning, and self-evolving test suites

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd itoc && npm install && cd ../ctge && npm install && cd ../sets && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build:itoc && npm run build:ctge && npm run build:sets
scripts.test: npm run test:itoc && npm run test:ctge && npm run test:sets
scripts.demo: npm run demo:mockoon && npm run demo:itoc

author: API-QA-Weaver Team
